response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which we believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its value and the benefits it offers, we are confident that it will be worth $1,000,000 to you. Considering its market value and the potential return on investment, we are offering you this exceptional opportunity at a special price of $950,000. We believe this offer represents an excellent value proposition and a strategic move for your company's growth. Please let us know if you require any further information or if you wish to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
